page.title: 13Transport.Long Distance.
page.content: The nearest airport is at Eastleigh some ten miles away,but reached very quickly by the new M27 motorway which was completed last year.With access at each end of the town the motorway serves to speed up deliveries both too and from the town. Bus services are adequate and run from the bus station in the centre of the town.Coaches run from here to the various destinations throughout the country and the costs work out very reasonably especially in comparison with the railway. Various by-passes which have been and are being built,keep most of the traffic out of the town itself.Many parks have been built for cars and although there are several thousand individual car billets there never seem to be enough.
